mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_action_counters (user_id, action, count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{action}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = count + 1, last_performed_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE((SELECT count FROM user_action_counters WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND action = #{action}), 0)
SELECT DISTINCT DATE(last_performed_at) as action_date FROM user_action_counters WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND action = #{action} ORDER BY action_date
